text: ESCP Business School is an European higher studies establishment. The school is in 6 places, in Paris, France, in the United Kingdom (London), in Spain (Madrid), in Italy (Torino), in Poland (Warsaw), and in Germany (Berlin), where it is a university.Andreas Kaplan (2018) A school is “a building that has four walls…with tomorrow inside”: Toward the reinvention of the business school, Business Horizons, https://doi.org/10.1016/j.bushor.2018.03.010 It is the oldest business school in the world established in 1819. Kaplan, Andreas (2014) European management and European business schools: Insights from the history of business schools, European Management Journal, https://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.emj.2014.03.006 A. Renouard, Histoire de l'École supérieure de commerce de Paris, Raymond Castell éditions, 1999 and therefore presents itself as "The World's First Business School". ESCP is specialist in the fields of economics, social sciences and management. ==References== == Further reading == * ESCP website Category:Education in France
